next_steps.note: "Define the core objectives and scope of the 'bidwells' project. Document these in a project brief/charter.",
"Identify key stakeholders for 'bidwells' and schedule a kickoff meeting to gather requirements and expectations.",
"Conduct preliminary research on 'bidwells' - what/who is it referring to? (e.g., a person, place, company, data set). Document findings.",
"Establish a basic project timeline with key milestones.  Even a high-level timeline helps prioritize work.",
"Create a simple risk assessment, identifying potential roadblocks and mitigation strategies for the 'bidwells' project."
"Confirm delivery timeline for outstanding items related to the 9 pending next steps and update project schedule accordingly.",
"Prioritize the 9 pending next steps based on dependency and impact; create a ranked list.",
"Assign owners to the top 3 prioritized next steps and set due dates.",
"Review current 'Issues' list (currently empty) - proactively brainstorm potential roadblocks for the prioritized next steps to mitigate risks.",
"Schedule a brief (15-minute) check-in meeting with project stakeholders to review prioritization and assigned next steps."
